title: Reanimated

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- While dead, choose any player to bite, infecting them. This is considered a visit.
 - You can be stopped by things like traps still, as if you were living.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Infected players spread the infection to whoever they visit.
- Upon dying at night, infect all your visitors.
- Upon being hanged, infect 5 random players who voted guilty.
- When all players are infected, the town is informed during the day, and all non-REF, non-neutral players are roleblocked the following night.
